subject: Soccer
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: When the St. John’s men’s soccer team takes on the fifth-seeded Maryland Terrapins in the second round of the N.C.A.A. tournament Wednesday night, the Red Storm will have several motivating factors.
snippet: When the St. John’s men’s soccer team takes on the fifth-seeded Maryland Terrapins in the second round of the N.C.A.A. tournament Wednesday night, the Red Storm will have several motivating factors.
